mapper.insert: insert into plandetail(pd_no, plan_no, day, trip_no) values(seq_days.nextval, #{plan_no}, #{day}, #{trip_no})
mapper.update: update plandetail set trip_no = #{trip_no} where pd_no = #{pd_no}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TRIP t WHERE t.trip_no IN (SELECT trip_no FROM PLANDETAIL pd WHERE plan_no = #{plan_no} AND DAY = #{day})
select trip_img from trip where trip_no = #{trip_no}
select pd_no from plandetail where plan_no = #{plan_no}
